card_text: Remove Spell Counters from your field to activate 1 of these effects.$N●2: Return 1 "Mythical Beast" Pendulum Monster you control to the hand.$N●4: Special Summon 1 face-up "Mythical Beast" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck, then you can place 2 Spell Counters on it.$N●6: Special Summon 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck.$NYou can only activate 1 "Beast Magic Attack" per turn.
